table_definition:
SELECT  bmc_incident, bmc_company, bmc_direct_contact_organization, bmc_direct_contact_departement, bmc_nome, bmc_cognome, bmc_servizio, bmc_status, CAST(bmc_data_submission AS TIMESTAMP) AS bmc_data_submission,
CAST(bmc_data_risoluzione AS TIMESTAMP) AS bmc_data_risoluzione, bmc_sommario, bmc_note, bmc_risoluzione, matricola_estesa
FROM fbk_test1__MASTER_DATA.ASSET_PERSONE_BMC_INCIDENT
